title: Keep Them Warm
description: Provide your pets with cozy blankets, warm bedding, and ensure they stay indoors during chilly nights.

title: Protect Their Paws
description: Use paw balm or pet shoes to prevent frostbite and cracked pads from cold ground and snow.

title: Hydrate Well
description: Keep their water bowl filled with fresh, unfrozen water during winter.

title: Balanced Diet
description: Feed your pets nutritious meals to help them maintain energy and body heat during cold weather.

title: Regular Checkups
description: Cold weather can worsen arthritis. Schedule a vet visit to ensure your petâ€™s comfort.
